	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage111"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	arising in law or equity or upon contract or tort or under any state or federal law or otherwise, which either Company or Guarantor has had, now has or has made claim to have against any such person for or by reason of any act, omission, matter, cause or thing whatsoever arising from the beginning of time to and including the date of this Amendment, whether such claims, demands and causes of action are matured or unmatured or known or unknown.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	It is the intention of the Company and Guarantor in executing this release that the same shall be effective as a bar to each and every claim, demand and cause of action specified and in furtherance of this intention the Company and Guarantor each waives and relinquishes all rights and benefits under Section 1542 of the Civil Code of the State of California, which provides:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;A GENERAL RELEASE DOES NOT EXTEND TO CLAIMS WHICH THE CREDITOR DOES NOT KNOW OR SUSPECT TO EXIST IN HIS OR HER FAVOR AT THE TIME OF EXECUTING THE RELEASE, WHICH IF KNOWN BY HIM OR HER MIGHT HAVE MATERIALLY AFFECTED HIS OR HER SETTLEMENT WITH THE DEBTOR.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The parties acknowledge that each may hereafter discover facts different from or in addition to those now known or believed to be true with respect to such claims, demands, or causes of action and agree that this instrument shall be and remain effective in all respects notwithstanding any such differences or additional facts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;COLOR:#000000;">
	9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Costs and Expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Company hereby reaffirms its agreement under the Credit Agreements to pay or reimburse Wells Fargo on demand for all costs and expenses incurred by Wells Fargo in connection with the Loan Documents, including, without limitation, all reasonable fees and disbursements of legal counsel.&nbsp;&nbsp;Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, Company specifically agrees to pay all reasonable fees and disbursements of counsel to Wells Fargo for the services performed by such counsel in connection with the preparation of this Amendment and the documents and instruments incidental hereto.&nbsp;&nbsp;Company hereby agrees that Wells Fargo may, at any time or from time to time in its sole discretion and without further authorization by Company, make a loan to Company under the Credit Agreements, or apply the proceeds of any loan, for the purpose of paying any such reasonable fees, disbursements, costs and expenses.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;COLOR:#000000;">
	10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Miscellaneous
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment and the Acknowledgment and Agreement of Guarantor may be executed in any number of counterparts, each of which when so executed and delivered shall be deemed an original and all of which counterparts, taken together, shall constitute one and the same instrument.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Transmission by facsimile or &#x201C;pdf&#x201D; file of an executed counterpart of this Amendment shall be deemed to constitute due and sufficient delivery of such counterpart.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any party hereto may request an original counterpart of any party delivering such electronic counterpart.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment and the rights and obligations of the parties hereto shall be construed in accordance with, and governed by, the laws of the State of California.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event of any conflict between this Amendment and the Credit Agreements, the terms of this Amendment shall govern.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Export-Import Bank of the United States shall be an express intended beneficiary of this Amendment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	[Signatures on next page]
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	ACKNOWLEDGMENT AND AGREEMENT OF GUARANTOR
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The undersigned, a guarantor of the indebtedness of Capstone Turbine Corporation (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) to Wells Fargo Bank, National Association (as more fully defined in the Amendment, &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Wells Fargo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), pursuant to the separate Guaranty dated February&nbsp;9, 2009 (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Guaranty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), hereby (i) acknowledges receipt of the foregoing Sixteenth Amendment to Credit and Security Agreements (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Amendment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;); (ii)&nbsp;consents and agrees to the terms (including, without limitation, the release set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&nbsp;8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the Amendment) and execution and performance thereof; (iii)&nbsp;reaffirms all obligations to Wells Fargo pursuant to the terms of the Guaranty; and (iv)&nbsp;acknowledges that Wells Fargo may amend, restate, extend, renew or otherwise modify the Credit Agreements and any indebtedness or agreement of the Company, or enter into any agreement or extend additional or other credit accommodations, without notifying or obtaining the consent of the undersigned and without impairing the liability of the undersigned under the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Guaranty for all of the Company&#x2019;s present and future indebtedness to Wells Fargo.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<A NAME="CPST-20160331EX109F520B4_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.9
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	AMENDMENT TO THE
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	CAPSTONE TURBINE CORPORATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	AMENDED AND RESTATED 2000 EQUITY INCENTIVE PLAN
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	THIS AMENDMENT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	to the Capstone Turbine Corporation Amended and Restated 2000 Equity Incentive Plan, as amended (the &#x201C;Plan&#x201D;), is made by Capstone Turbine Corporation (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) to be effective as provided herein.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	RECITALS:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	WHEREAS,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Company established the Plan as an equity incentive plan and last amended and restated the Plan effective August 30, 2012 upon approval by the stockholders of the Company at its annual meeting;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	WHEREAS,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Company desires to amend the Plan to modify the dollar value of the automatic award of restricted stock units that are granted each year to the Company&#x2019;s non-employee directors from $35,000 to $47,500;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	NOW, THEREFORE,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	pursuant to authorization of the Company&#x2019;s board of directors, the Plan is hereby amended effective August 28, 2015 by restating Section 13(a) of the Plan as set forth below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 26.1PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	A Director who is not an employee of the Company or any of its affiliates, including a retired or former employee of the Company or its affiliates, (a &#x201C;Non-Employee Director&#x201D;) shall be granted on the date the Non-Employee Director is elected to the Board in the Company&#x2019;s annual meeting of stockholders, or is otherwise appointed to the Board, an Award of Restricted Stock Units. The number of Shares subject to this annual Award have a Fair Market Value of $47,500 on the date of grant, subject to adjustment from time to time as determined by the Committee in its discretion. The Restricted Stock Units shall become vested upon completion of the annual term of the Board that includes the date of grant (the &#x201C;Annual Retainer&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the undersigned officer of the Company has executed this Amendment to the Plan pursuant to authorization from the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
<A NAME="FIS_EXPERTS_CONSENT"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Board of Directors

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Capstone Turbine Corporation:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We consent to the incorporation by reference in the registration statements (No.&nbsp;333
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;203431) on Form&nbsp;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;3 and registration statements (Nos. 333-207967, 333-203432, 333-184033, 333-180616, 333-170588 and 333-160049) on Form&nbsp;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;8 of Capstone Turbine Corporation of our reports dated June&nbsp;9, 2016, with respect to the consolidated balance sheets of Capstone Turbine Corporation as of March&nbsp;31, 2016 and 2015, and the related consolidated statements of operations, stockholders&#x2019; equity, and cash flows for each of the years in the three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;year period ended March&nbsp;31, 2016, and the related financial statement schedule for each of the years in the three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;year period ended March&nbsp;31, 2016, and the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting as of March&nbsp;31, 2016, which reports appear in the March&nbsp;31, 2016 annual report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K of Capstone Turbine Corporation.

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</P>

</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION OF THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In connection with the annual report of Capstone Turbine Corporation (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K for the fiscal year ended March&nbsp;31, 2016, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#x201C;Report&#x201D;), Darren R. Jamison, as Chief Executive Officer of the Company, and Jayme L. Brooks, as Chief Financial Officer of the Company, each hereby certifies, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Sec. 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
